error-admin-vpses-add-burstable.message: You did not enter a valid burstable RAM specification.

console-step2.message: After logging in with the above details, you will have to enter your VPS panel login details, after which you can select a VPS to invoke a root shell on.

console-step1.message: To use the out-of-band console, connect through SSH using the following details:

error-logout-notloggedin-text.message: You can only logout when you are already logged in.

error-reinstall-suspended-text.message: You can not reinstall this VPS, because it is suspended. If you believe this is in error, please contact support.

reinstall-warning.message: I understand that by reinstalling my VPS, all data on the VPS is permanently lost and cannot be recovered. There will be no further confirmations, after clicking the Reinstall button the reinstallation process cannot be aborted.

error-admin-vpses-add-guaranteed.message: You did not enter a valid guaranteed RAM specification.

error-admin-nodes-add-hostname.message: You did not fill in a valid hostname.

error-logout-success-text.message: You have been successfully logged out. You can now close this page.

error-suspend-error-text.message: The VPS could not be suspended.

admin-overview-message.message: In the future, this page will hold a log of all most recent events. For now, it's just an empty page.

error-password-success-text.message: Your new root password was successfully configured. Please ensure to change your root password again from your VPS after logging in.

error-start-terminated-text.message: Your VPS could not be started, as it is terminated.

console-introduction.message: If you cannot access your VPS for some reason, you can use the out-of-band console (also known as shell dropper) to invoke a root shell.

warning-password-text.message: Configuring your root password through this panel may expose it to the VPS provider. Only use this feature in an emergency situation, and always change your password again afterwards, from within your VPS.

error-admin-vpses-add-user.message: You did not select a valid user.

error-password-missing-text.message: Both fields are required. Please try again.

error-suspend-success-text.message: The VPS has been suspended and can no longer be used by the owner.

error-password-nomatch-text.message: Both entries must be identical. Please try again.

warning-suspended-text.message: You cannot change any configuration or perform any actions on this VPS. If you feel this should not be the case, please contact support.

error-unauthorized-title.message: You are not authorized to view this page

error-start-suspended-text.message: Your VPS could not be started, as it is currently suspended. If you believe this is in error, please file a support ticket.

reinstall-patience.message: (be patient; this may take a while)

error-reinstall-unavailable-text.message: The template you selected is not available. Please select a different template.

error-terminate-success-text.message: The VPS has been terminated and can no longer be used by the owner.

error-reinstall-notselected-text.message: You did not select a template from the list. Please select a template and try again.

vps-admin-unsuspend-text.message: Are you sure you wish to unsuspend this VPS? The owner will be able to use it again.

error-password-terminated-text.message: You can not configure the root password for this VPS, because it has been terminated.

error-unsuspend-success-text.message: The VPS has been unsuspended and can now be used by the owner again.

error-admin-vpses-add-cpucount.message: You did not enter a valid amount of CPUs.

error-stop-stopped-text.message: Your VPS cannot be stopped because it is not running.

error-stop-terminated-text.message: Your VPS could not be stopped, as it is terminated.

error-admin-nodes-add-privatekey.message: You did not upload a valid private key.

warning-terminated-text.message: You cannot change any configuration or perform any actions on this VPS, as it is terminated.

error-admin-nodes-add-name.message: You did not fill in a valid name.

error-admin-vpses-add-template.message: You did not select a valid template.

error-reinstall-terminated-text.message: You can not reinstall this VPS, because it has been terminated.

error-stop-failed-text.message: Your VPS could not be stopped. If this error persists, please file a support ticket.

error-stop-suspended-text.message: Your VPS could not be stopped, as it is currently suspended. If you believe this is in error, please file a support ticket.

error-unterminate-success-text.message: The VPS has been unterminated and can now be used by the owner again.

error-unsuspend-error-text.message: The VPS could not be unsuspended.

error-admin-nodes-add-location.message: You did not fill in a valid physical location.

error-start-failed-text.message: Your VPS could not be started. If this error persists, please file a support ticket.

error-login-invalid-text.message: The login details you provided are invalid. Please try again.

notfound.message: The specified VPS was not found.

error-admin-nodes-add-upload.message: Something went wrong while processing the uploaded keys. Ensure that the keys directory is writable.

error-notfound-text.message: The VPS you selected was not found.

error-password-suspended-text.message: You can not configure the root password for this VPS, because it is suspended. If you believe this is in error, please contact support.

error-unauthorized-text.message: Your access level is not sufficient or you are not logged in.

error-password-invalid-text.message: Your password may be in an invalid format. Try again with a different password.

error-restart-terminated-text.message: Your VPS could not be restarted, as it is terminated.

error-terminate-error-text.message: The VPS could not be terminated.

error-admin-nodes-add-publickey.message: You did not upload a valid public key.

error-reinstall-failed-text.message: Something went wrong during the reinstallation of your VPS. Please try again. If the reinstallation fails again, please contact support.

error-restart-suspended-text.message: Your VPS could not be restarted, as it is currently suspended. If you believe this is in error, please file a support ticket.

vps-admin-suspend-text.message: Are you sure you wish to suspend this VPS? The owner will no longer be able to use it, until it is unsuspended!

error-admin-vpses-add-node.message: You did not select a valid node.

error-reinstall-notfound-text.message: The template you selected does not exist (anymore). Please select a different template.

error-start-running-text.message: Your VPS cannot be started because it is already running.

vps-admin-unterminate-text.message: Are you sure you wish to unterminate this VPS? The owner will be able to use it again.

vps-admin-terminate-text.message: Are you sure you wish to terminate this VPS? The VPS will be suspended immediately, and deleted after several hours. As long as it is not deleted, the termination can be undone.

error-reinstall-confirm-text.message: You did not tick the checkbox at the bottom of the page. Please carefully read the warning, tick the checkbox, and try again.

error-unterminate-error-text.message: The VPS could not be unterminated.

error-admin-user-text.message: The user you tried to look up does not exist.

error-admin-vpses-add-disk.message: You did not enter a valid disk space specification.

footer.message: CVM is a free and open source VPS control panel. Want to contribute?

error-reinstall-start-text.message: The VPS was successfully reinstalled, but it could not be started. If the issue persists, please contact support.

error-restart-start-text.message: Your VPS could not be started. If this error persists, please file a support ticket.

error-admin-vpses-add-traffic.message: You did not enter a valid traffic allocation specification.
